import React from 'react' const Info = () => { return (

What is task tracker?

A task tracker is an intelligent version of a to-do list that can help manage tasks and assignments. Team members can use task trackers individually or together as a team. Team members can track their time as they work on each assignment on the task list, which provides helpful information for determining future costs and benchmarking. It can also alert managers if a simple task takes longer than expected so that the manager can step in and help optimize the process.

How this page work?

you can just add your task that you want to add it and then add date of that

There is also a reminder which you can turn it on/off which allows you to know which of your task has own reminder

) } export default Info
